cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic Pod in a room of 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A single private POD in a 6 POD room with ensuite. Self-contained and secure, our PODs feature king single mattresses, with USB and power points, lockable storage for peace of mind and in-built ventilation. Shared kitchen facilities, plus rooftop bar.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard Pod in a room of 4 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A single private POD in a 4 POD room, for females only with Ensuite. Self-contained and secure, our PODs feature king single mattresses, with USB and power points, lockable storage for peace of mind and in-built ventilation. Shared kitchen facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Want to own your space? Our cozy private rooms come with a king bed, complete with an En-suite. No sharing here, youâ€™ll also get an in-room TV for on-demand entertainment!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Stretch out in our family En-suite rooms, equipped with a comfy Queen-sized bed and a set of two pods. Perfectly private for your family or group, and kitted out with your own TV and bathroom.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Book the whole room for your crew! This space features up to 4 PODS in a room, for females only, with it's own en-suite bathroom. Our PODs feature king single mattresses, USB and power points, lockable storage for peace of mind and in-built ventilation.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Book the whole room for your crew! This space features up to 6 PODS in a room with ensuite, ideal for groups and teams. Our PODs feature king single mattresses, USB and power points, lockable storage for peace of mind and in-built ventilation.
